wikipedia_page.main: Hugh ("Hughie") Cochrane (9 February 1943 – 17 August 2020) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as an inside forward. Born in Glasgow, he played junior football for Dennistoun Waverley before signing for Dundee United in 1961. He was released in 1963 without having appeared in the first team. He signed for Barnsley in August 1963, making five Football League appearances. After leaving Barnsley, Cochrane played non-League football for Wimbledon, Ashford Town (Kent) and Margate.

response: *Hugh Cochrane, 77, Scottish footballer (Dundee United, Barnsley, Margate).RIP Hughie Cochrane
